task.name: hifv_selfcal
task.shortdescription: Perform phase-only self-calibration, per scan row, on VLASS SE images
task.description:
Perform phase-only self-calibration, per scan row, on VLASS SE images
Output: results -- If pipeline mode is 'getinputs' then None is returned. Otherwise the results object for the pipeline task is returned.

param.name: vis
param.description: List of visibility data files. These may be ASDMs, tar files of ASDMs, MSes, or tar files of MSes, If ASDM files are specified, they will be converted to MS format. example: vis=['X227.ms', 'asdms.tar.gz']

param.name: pipelinemode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In 'interactive' mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.

param.name: dryrun
param.shortdescription: Run the task (False) or display task command (True)
param.description: Run the commands (True) or generate the commands to be run but do not execute (False). This is a pipeline task execution mode.

param.name: acceptresults
param.shortdescription: Add the results into the pipeline context
param.description: Add the results of the task to the pipeline context (True) or reject them (False). This is a pipeline task execution mode.

param.name: refantignore
param.shortdescription: String list of antennas to ignore
param.description: String list of antennas to ignore

param.name: combine
param.shortdescription: Data axes which to combine for solve (obs, scan, spw, and/or field)
param.description:
Data axes which to combine for solve Options: '','obs','scan','spw',field', or any comma-separated combination in a single string
Example: combine='scan,spw' - Extend solutions over scan boundaries (up to the solint), and combine spws for solving.
In selfcalmode='VLASS-SE' use the default value.

param.name: selfcalmode
param.description: Heuristics mode selection. Known modes are 'VLASS' and 'VLASS-SE'. Default value is 'VLASS'.

param.name: overwrite_modelcol
param.shortdescription: Always write the model column, even if it already exists
param.description: Always write the model column, even if it already exists

task.example:
Examples
1. Basic selfcal task
hifv_selfcal()
2. VLASS-SE selfcal usage
hifv_selfcal(selfcalmode='VLASS-SE', combine='field,spw')
